18#ifndef _LVM_DEFAULTS_H
19#define _LVM_DEFAULTS_H
20
21#define DEFAULT_ARCHIVE_ENABLED 1
22#define DEFAULT_BACKUP_ENABLED 1
23
24#define DEFAULT_ARCHIVE_SUBDIR "archive"
25#define DEFAULT_BACKUP_SUBDIR "backup"
26#define DEFAULT_CACHE_SUBDIR "cache"
27#define DEFAULT_CACHE_FILE_PREFIX ""
28
29#define DEFAULT_ARCHIVE_DAYS 30
30#define DEFAULT_ARCHIVE_NUMBER 10
31
32#define DEFAULT_SYS_DIR "/etc/lvm"
33#define DEFAULT_DEV_DIR "/dev"
34#define DEFAULT_PROC_DIR "/proc"
35#define DEFAULT_SYSFS_SCAN 1
36#define DEFAULT_MD_COMPONENT_DETECTION 1
37#define DEFAULT_MD_CHUNK_ALIGNMENT 1
38#define DEFAULT_IGNORE_SUSPENDED_DEVICES 1
39#define DEFAULT_DATA_ALIGNMENT_OFFSET_DETECTION 1
40#define DEFAULT_DATA_ALIGNMENT_DETECTION 1
41
42#define DEFAULT_LOCK_DIR "/var/run/lvm"
43#define DEFAULT_LOCKING_LIB "liblvm2clusterlock.so"
44#define DEFAULT_FALLBACK_TO_LOCAL_LOCKING 1
45#define DEFAULT_FALLBACK_TO_CLUSTERED_LOCKING 1
46#define DEFAULT_WAIT_FOR_LOCKS 1
47#define DEFAULT_PRIORITISE_WRITE_LOCKS 1
48
49#define DEFAULT_MIRRORLOG "disk"
50#define DEFAULT_MIRROR_LOG_FAULT_POLICY "allocate"
51#define DEFAULT_MIRROR_DEV_FAULT_POLICY "remove"
52#define DEFAULT_DMEVENTD_MIRROR_LIB "libdevmapper-event-lvm2mirror.so"
53#define DEFAULT_DMEVENTD_MONITOR 1
54
55#define DEFAULT_UMASK 0077
56
57#ifdef LVM1_FALLBACK
58# define DEFAULT_FALLBACK_TO_LVM1 1
59#else
60# define DEFAULT_FALLBACK_TO_LVM1 0
61#endif
62
63#define DEFAULT_FORMAT "lvm2"
64
65#define DEFAULT_STRIPESIZE 64 /* KB */
66#define DEFAULT_PVMETADATASIZE 255
67#define DEFAULT_PVMETADATACOPIES 1
68#define DEFAULT_LABELSECTOR UINT64_C(1)
69#define DEFAULT_READ_AHEAD "auto"
70#define DEFAULT_UDEV_SYNC 0
71#define DEFAULT_EXTENT_SIZE 4096 /* In KB */
72#define DEFAULT_MAX_PV 0
73#define DEFAULT_MAX_LV 0
74#define DEFAULT_ALLOC_POLICY ALLOC_NORMAL
75#define DEFAULT_CLUSTERED 0
76
77#define DEFAULT_MSG_PREFIX " "
78#define DEFAULT_CMD_NAME 0
79#define DEFAULT_OVERWRITE 0
80
81#ifndef DEFAULT_LOG_FACILITY
82# define DEFAULT_LOG_FACILITY LOG_USER
83#endif
84
85#define DEFAULT_SYSLOG 1
86#define DEFAULT_VERBOSE 0
87#define DEFAULT_LOGLEVEL 0
88#define DEFAULT_INDENT 1
89#define DEFAULT_UNITS "h"
90#define DEFAULT_SUFFIX 1
91#define DEFAULT_HOSTTAGS 0
92
93#ifndef DEFAULT_SI_UNIT_CONSISTENCY
94# define DEFAULT_SI_UNIT_CONSISTENCY 1
95#endif
96
97#ifdef DEVMAPPER_SUPPORT
98# define DEFAULT_ACTIVATION 1
99# define DEFAULT_RESERVED_MEMORY 8192
100# define DEFAULT_RESERVED_STACK 256
101# define DEFAULT_PROCESS_PRIORITY -18
102#else
103# define DEFAULT_ACTIVATION 0
104#endif
105
106#define DEFAULT_STRIPE_FILLER "error"
107#define DEFAULT_MIRROR_REGION_SIZE 512 /* KB */
108#define DEFAULT_INTERVAL 15
109
110#ifdef READLINE_SUPPORT
111# define DEFAULT_MAX_HISTORY 100
112#endif
113
114#define DEFAULT_REP_ALIGNED 1
115#define DEFAULT_REP_BUFFERED 1
116#define DEFAULT_REP_COLUMNS_AS_ROWS 0
117#define DEFAULT_REP_HEADINGS 1
118#define DEFAULT_REP_PREFIXES 0
119#define DEFAULT_REP_QUOTED 1
120#define DEFAULT_REP_SEPARATOR " "
121
122#define DEFAULT_LVS_COLS "lv_name,vg_name,lv_attr,lv_size,origin,snap_percent,move_pv,mirror_log,copy_percent,convert_lv"
123#define DEFAULT_VGS_COLS "vg_name,pv_count,lv_count,snap_count,vg_attr,vg_size,vg_free"
124#define DEFAULT_PVS_COLS "pv_name,vg_name,pv_fmt,pv_attr,pv_size,pv_free"
125#define DEFAULT_SEGS_COLS "lv_name,vg_name,lv_attr,stripes,segtype,seg_size"
126#define DEFAULT_PVSEGS_COLS "pv_name,vg_name,pv_fmt,pv_attr,pv_size,pv_free,pvseg_start,pvseg_size"
127
128#define DEFAULT_LVS_COLS_VERB "lv_name,vg_name,seg_count,lv_attr,lv_size,lv_major,lv_minor,lv_kernel_major,lv_kernel_minor,origin,snap_percent,move_pv,copy_percent,mirror_log,convert_lv,lv_uuid"
129#define DEFAULT_VGS_COLS_VERB "vg_name,vg_attr,vg_extent_size,pv_count,lv_count,snap_count,vg_size,vg_free,vg_uuid"
130#define DEFAULT_PVS_COLS_VERB "pv_name,vg_name,pv_fmt,pv_attr,pv_size,pv_free,dev_size,pv_uuid"
131#define DEFAULT_SEGS_COLS_VERB "lv_name,vg_name,lv_attr,seg_start,seg_size,stripes,segtype,stripesize,chunksize"
132#define DEFAULT_PVSEGS_COLS_VERB "pv_name,vg_name,pv_fmt,pv_attr,pv_size,pv_free,pvseg_start,pvseg_size,lv_name,seg_start_pe,segtype,seg_pe_ranges"
133
134#define DEFAULT_LVS_SORT "vg_name,lv_name"
135#define DEFAULT_VGS_SORT "vg_name"
136#define DEFAULT_PVS_SORT "pv_name"
137#define DEFAULT_SEGS_SORT "vg_name,lv_name,seg_start"
138#define DEFAULT_PVSEGS_SORT "pv_name,pvseg_start"
139
140#define DEFAULT_MIRROR_DEVICE_FAULT_POLICY "remove"
141#define DEFAULT_MIRROR_LOG_FAULT_POLICY "allocate"
142
143#endif /* _LVM_DEFAULTS_H */
